A cheerful, beautiful, bold, confident and sporty lady.

I currently live in London.

"How you do anything is how you do everything - T Harv Eker"

My favourite time:

  • playing chess
  • cafe-hopping
  • gardening

I am a person who enjoys balancing strategy, creativity, and relaxation in my daily life.
Playing chess is one of my favorite pastimes because it challenges me to think ahead, stay focused, and sharpen my problem-solving skills.

Beyond the chessboard, I enjoy cafe-hopping, where I can explore new neighborhoods, discover cozy atmospheres, and taste different styles of coffee and pastries. Gardening is another passion of mine, as it allows me to slow down, connect with nature, and nurture growth over time. Together, these interests keep me curious, grounded, and inspired to make the most of each day.
